channel.title: GWAS on Bárbara Bitarello
channel.description: Recent content in GWAS on Bárbara Bitarello

item.title: Genome-wide analysis identifies genetic effects on reproductive success and ongoing natural selection at the FADS locus.
Shriya Shivakumar
item.description: Fun Fact: I enjoy cooking, baking, eating extremely spicy food, reading and watching rom-coms. I also love Thai food and the chameleon, Pascal, from Tangled. In the lab: joined us 2022 in a dual mentorship program with Chris Thom at CHOP.
